item.title: 奇波特尔、亿滋国际股价下跌，需求疲软与成本上升拖累销售预期
item.description: 墨西哥卷饼连锁品牌Chipotle Mexican Grill的股价周三盘前暴跌6%，亿滋国际（Mondelez International）股价下跌4.5%。两家公司发布的年度销售预测黯淡，引发市场对消费者需求疲软及投入成本上升的担忧。【原文：Shares of burrito chain Chipotle Mexican Grill slumped 6% and Mondelez International fell 4.5% before the bell on Wednesday as dour annual sales forecasts from the companies raised worries over weak consumer demand and rising input costs.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行股价下跌，因拟以122亿美元收购韦伯斯特银行
item.description: 桑坦德银行股价周三一度下跌5%，此前该公司宣布拟以122亿美元收购韦伯斯特金融公司，而分析师们虽认可该交易的战略意义，却同时警示了短期执行风险。【原文：Santander shares fell as much as 5% on Wednesday after the announcement of its proposed $12.2 billion acquisition of Webster Financial and the flagging of short-term execution risks by analysts who otherwise welcomed the deal's strategic rationale.】

item.title: 恩智浦首席执行官称"物理人工智能"需求推动前景向好
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司的新任首席执行官向路透社表示，随着企业将人工智能应用于物流自动化、工作场所安全和机器人技术等工业系统，该公司正受益于其所谓的"物理人工智能"。【原文：Dutch computer chip maker NXP Semiconductors is benefitting from what it calls "physical AI", as businesses apply artificial intelligence in industrial systems such as logistics automation, workplace safety and robotics, its new CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 全球软件股因Anthropic对人工智能颠覆性影响的警示而受挫
item.description: 深度抛售反映出市场对人工智能发展可能影响企业生存的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The deep selloff reflected growing concerns about how advances in artificial intelligence might impact companies' livelihoods.】

item.title: 深圳汉斯数控定价区间上限在香港上市，目标筹资6.18亿港元
item.description: 印刷电路板（PCB）设备制造商深圳汉斯数控科技周三表示，其香港上市定价将位于发行价区间的上限，计划募集资金总额达48.3亿港元（6.1815亿美元）。【原文：Printed circuit board (PCB) equipment maker Shenzhen Han's CNC Technology said on Wednesday it was set to price its Hong Kong listing at the top end of its offer range, aiming to raise a total of HK$4.83 billion ($618.15 million).】

item.title: 日经报道称丰田计划到2028年将混合动力车产量提升30%
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周三报道，丰田计划到2028年将混合动力和插电式混合动力汽车产量提升至约670万辆，较其2026年目标高出约30%。【原文：Toyota plans to boost production of hybrid and plug‑in hybrid vehicles to around 6.7 million units by 2028, about 30% higher than its target for 2026, the Nikkei business daily reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国慕源制药瞄准香港上市定价区间上限，拟募资14亿美元
item.description: 中国最大的生猪养殖企业牧元食品周三宣布，已确定以最高发行价在香港上市，计划通过此次股票发行筹集约106.9亿港元（13.7亿美元）。【原文：China's biggest pig breeder, Muyuan Foods said on Wednesday it has determined to price its Hong Kong listing at its maximum offer price, aiming to raise about HK$10.69 billion ($1.37 billion) from the share sale.】

item.title: 全球监管机构警示16万亿美元政府支持回购市场风险
item.description: 全球金融监管机构周三警告称，规模达16万亿美元的政府债券回购市场正积聚风险隐患，指出对冲基金杠杆率攀升且对短期融资的依赖日益加深。【原文：Vulnerabilities are building across the $16 trillion market for government bond-backed repurchase agreements, a global financial watchdog warned on Wednesday, highlighting rising leverage among hedge funds and growing dependence on short-term funding.】

item.title: 雀巢扩大法国婴幼儿配方奶粉召回范围，新增吉格兹新批次产品
item.description: 雀巢公司周三表示，在法国降低乳脂毒素的最高限值后，该公司扩大了婴儿配方奶粉的召回范围，新增一批吉格兹牌奶粉。【原文：Nestle widened an infant formula recall to include a new batch of Guigoz formula after France lowered the maximum cereulide toxin threshold, the Swiss group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商推出长期融资计划以刺激需求
item.description: 中国汽车制造商正将客户还款期限延长至长达八年，以吸引消费者，尽管全球最大汽车市场的需求持续低迷。【原文：Automakers in China are extending repayment terms for customers to as long as eight years to woo consumers amid stagnant demand in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 特斯拉1月在华电动汽车销量同比增长9.3%
item.description: 特斯拉1月份在中国销售了69,129辆国产电动汽车，同比增长9.3%，连续第三个月实现增长。尽管这家电动汽车制造商在中国和欧洲市场都面临着市场份额萎缩的困境。【原文：Tesla sold 69,129 China-made electric vehicles in January, up 9.3% from a year-ago period, extending gains for a third consecutive month even as the electric vehicle maker battles shrinking market share in both China and Europe.】

item.title: 汉高以21亿欧元收购特种涂料公司Stahl
item.description: 汉高公司周三宣布，已同意以21亿欧元（约合25亿美元）从施泰尔集团收购特种涂料公司施泰尔。【原文：Persil-owner Henkel said on Wednesday it agreed to buy specialty coatings company Stahl for 2.1 billion euros ($2.5 billion) from Stahl Group.】

item.title: 台湾联发科警示人工智能引发供应链危机，称将调整价格
item.description: 台湾最大芯片设计公司联发科周三表示，人工智能应用需求的激增正使供应链承压并推高成本，该公司将据此调整自身产品定价。【原文：A surge in demand for artificial intelligence applications is straining supply chains and driving up costs, Taiwan's top chip design company MediaTek said on Wednesday, adding it would adjust its own prices in response.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车11月至1月销量下滑7%，市场环境严峻
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周三表示，在11月至1月期间共售出177,830辆汽车，较去年同期下降7%。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars sold 177,830 cars in the November-January period, down 7% from the same period a year earlier, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 瑞士手表公司上调年度销售预期，因美国和英国奢侈品需求强劲
item.description: 奢侈品零售商瑞士手表公司周三上调了年度销售预期，称其核心奢侈品牌在美国和英国市场需求强劲。【原文：Luxury retailer Watches of Switzerland raised its annual sales forecast on Wednesday, citing robust demand for the company's key luxury brands in the U.S. and the UK markets.】

item.title: AMD法兰克福上市股价下跌，因销售疲软
item.description: 周三法兰克福早盘交易中，超微半导体股价下跌逾6%，此前该公司预测季度营收将小幅下滑，引发市场对其能否在蓬勃发展的人工智能市场有效挑战英伟达的担忧。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices shares fell over 6% in early Frankfurt trading on Wednesday after the company forecast a slight decline in quarterly revenue, raising concerns about whether it can effectively challenge Nvidia in the booming AI market.】

item.title: 嘉士伯年度利润超预期，啤酒巨头警告2026年将面临更多挑战
item.description: 丹麦啤酒制造商嘉士伯周三公布全年营业利润增长5%，超出市场预期，但警告称在持续严峻的消费环境下，公司不期待任何改善。【原文：Danish brewer Carlsberg on Wednesday reported a forecast-beating 5% rise in full-year operating profit, but warned it did not expect any improvements in a stubbornly difficult consumer environment.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险以110亿美元的加价收购方案赢得英国比兹利公司
item.description: 英国专业保险公司比兹利周三表示，一旦瑞士公司苏黎世保险提出正式要约，该公司将建议接受其提高至80亿英镑（109.7亿美元）的收购报价。此前比兹利已多次拒绝苏黎世保险的收购提议。【原文：UK speciality insurer Beazley would recommend a sweetened 8 billion pound ($10.97 billion) takeover by Zurich Insurance once the Swiss firm makes a firm offer, it said on Wednesday after rejecting previous multiple bids.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克预计2026年销售增长放缓，新任首席执行官米尔斯正筹备战略转型
item.description: 在首席执行官卢克·米尔斯首次发布的前景展望中，葛兰素史克周三表示，随着公司扩大研发管线以应对畅销艾滋病药物即将到期的专利问题，预计2026年销售额增长将较上年放缓。【原文：In the first outlook presented by new CEO Luke Miels, GSK on Wednesday said it expected slower sales growth in 2026 compared with a year earlier, as it expands its pipeline to counter looming patent expiries for its top-selling HIV drugs.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋驳斥人工智能将取代软件工具的担忧，公司股价持续下跌
item.description: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋驳斥了人工智能将取代软件及相关工具的担忧，称这种想法"不合逻辑"。此前全球软件股在周二遭遇大幅抛售。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismissed fears that artificial intelligence will replace software and related tools, calling the idea "illogical", after a significant selloff in global software stocks on Tuesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德2026年业绩指引令人震惊，表明肥胖症治疗领域竞争日趋激烈
item.description: 丹麦减肥药巨头诺和诺德周三将面临投资者惩罚，此前该公司给出了远低于预期的2026年展望，并警告称随着价格承受压力，减肥药市场将面临激烈竞争。【原文：Danish obesity drug giant Novo Nordisk is set to be punished by investors on Wednesday after it gave a far bleaker-than-expected outlook for 2026 and flagged a tough weight-loss market battle ahead as prices come under pressure.】

item.title: TomTom预计2026年营收将持平或小幅下滑，2027年将恢复增长。
item.description: 荷兰定位技术公司TomTom预计，受部分客户转型影响，其2026年营收将持平或下滑。【原文：Dutch location technology company TomTom expects its revenue to be steady or lower in 2026, affected by the transition of some customers.】

item.title: 英飞凌将投资目标提高5亿欧元以满足数据中心需求
item.description: 德国英飞凌公司表示，计划在本财年额外投资5亿欧元（约合5.9165亿美元）用于扩大芯片产能。该公司为人工智能数据中心提供芯片支持，预计该业务收入将在2027年增长三分之二。【原文：Germany's Infineon , whose chips power AI data centres, said it plans to invest an extra 500 million euros ($591.65 million) in manufacturing capacity this fiscal year as it expects revenue from that business to grow by two-thirds in 2027.】

item.title: 诺华预计2026年营业利润将出现低个位数下滑
item.description: 瑞士制药巨头诺华周三预测，2026年其营业利润将出现低个位数百分比的下滑，主要受心脏药物恩特雷斯托等成熟产品面临廉价仿制药竞争的拖累。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Novartis forecast a decline in 2026 operating profit in the low single-digit percentage range on Wednesday, held back by competition from cheaper copies of established products such as heart drug Entresto.】

item.title: 瑞银季度利润超预期，计划增持回购
item.description: 瑞士银行瑞银周三公布第四季度净利润达12亿美元，同比增长56%，超出该公司提供的9.19亿美元市场预期。【原文：Swiss bank UBS posted on Wednesday a net profit of $1.2 billion for the fourth quarter, up 56% year-on-year and ahead of a company-provided consensus forecast of $919 million.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行利润因Banco BPM计提及成本上升下滑39%
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行周三表示，受增持意大利BPM银行股份相关费用、成本上升及汽车租赁业务亏损影响，其第四季度利润下滑39%。【原文：Credit Agricole on Wednesday said its fourth-quarter profit fell 39% due to a charge related to its increased stake in Italy's Banco BPM , rising costs and losses at its car-leasing business.】

item.title: 德国Uniper公司淡化对美国液化天然气的日益依赖，强调能源多元化
item.description: 德国能源公司Uniper的一位高管淡化了欧洲对日益依赖美国液化天然气（LNG）的担忧，称企业签订的是与公司而非政府的合同，同时强调了多元化的必要性。【原文：A top executive at German utility Uniper has played down European concerns over increasing dependence on liquefied natural gas (LNG) from the United States, saying companies sign contracts with firms rather than governments, while stressing the need for diversification.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称，在遭遇投资者反对后，Tether淡化了200亿美元融资规模
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，加密货币集团Tether首席执行官保罗·阿尔多伊诺在投资者对其5000亿美元估值目标提出质疑后，下调了新一轮融资目标金额。【原文：Crypto group Tether Chief Executive Paolo Ardoino has downplayed the amount of money it will raise in a new funding round following investor pushback over its $500-billion valuation goal, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道：雀巢新任掌门人谋划战略转型以提振增长
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三援引知情人士报道，雀巢新任首席执行官正计划实施战略重组，将这家庞大的跨国公司业务聚焦于四大产品类别。【原文：The new chief executive of Nestle is planning a strategic overhaul to refocus the sprawling multinational around four product categories, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称福特与吉利正就制造与技术合作展开谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，福特汽车与中国的吉利汽车[RIC:RIC:GEELY.UL]正就潜在合作展开磋商。随着全球汽车制造商寻求分担日益沉重的技术研发与生产成本，此类合作正成为行业趋势。【原文：Ford and China’s Geely [RIC:RIC:GEELY.UL] are in discussions about a potential partnership, eight people with knowledge of the ongoing talks said, as the world's carmakers look to share heavier technology and manufacturing costs.】
